name: Practice#2/PlayerVsPlayer
description:
This is the first Competitive game that i have had the pleasure is making.

Player 1 in order to win must survive til the timer its 0

Player 2 in order to win must eliminate player 1

Controls:

Player 1: Uses w-jump a-move left d-move right

Player 2: Use the mouse in order to aim its cannon and arrow keys to move around

To quickly restart a round press the space bar
